title: Comprehensive benchmarking of methods for mutation calling in circulating tumor DNA
abstract:
Detection of somatic mutations in cell-free DNA is challenging due to low variant allele frequencies and extensive DNA fragmentation. Here, the authors use longitudinal samples from colorectal and breast cancer patients to clarify performance limits of current approaches and support application of cfDNA analyses in cancer liquid biopsies. 
 Detection of somatic mutations in cell-free DNA (cfDNA) is challenging due to low variant allele frequencies and extensive DNA degradation. Here we develop a benchmarking strategy using longitudinal patient-matched cfDNA samples from individuals with colorectal and breast cancer. Samples with high and ultra-low levels of tumor-derived DNA are combined into controlled dilution series that preserve the properties of authentic cell-free DNA, including each patient’s germline and blood-cell mutation backgrounds. Using deep whole-genome (150x) and exome (2,000x) sequencing, we define a reference set of ~37,000 single nucleotide variants and ~58,000 indels to benchmark nine somatic variant callers across varying ctDNA levels and sequencing depths. We also explore machine learning–based tuning of individual callers and identify features that improve accuracy in cfDNA. This benchmarking resource clarifies the detection limits of current approaches and provides practical guidance for selecting somatic variant calling methods in liquid biopsy applications. Detection of somatic mutations in cell-free DNA is challenging due to low variant allele frequencies and extensive DNA fragmentation. Here, the authors use longitudinal samples from colorectal and breast cancer patients to clarify performance limits of current approaches and support application of cfDNA analyses in cancer liquid biopsies.

explanation: 该论文主要研究SARS-CoV-2特异性CD8+ T细胞受体对抗原漂移的抵抗潜力，涉及免疫学中的HLA-A2限制性、抗原表位变异、疫苗诱导免疫逃逸等概念，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、污染物监测、大气成分分析等）无直接关联。研究核心为免疫应答机制，而非环境遥感技术或大气质量分析。
authors: Michael J. Malone;Chao Huang;Yong Zhang;Yi Qi;Lea Williams;Laura F. Su;Jizhong Lou;Ning Jiang
title: Resistance potential of the HLA-A2-restricted immunodominant SARS-CoV-2-specific CD8<sup>+</sup> T cell receptor repertoire to antigenic drift
abstract:
It remains elusive whether the T cell repertoire will cover all point mutations of a major epitope. The authors here show that COVID vaccine–induced CD8⁺ T cells detect most YLQ peptide variants except R5, but naïve T cells fill this gap by responding to R5 despite abundant WT-specific cells, ensuring broad coverage to prevent viral immune-escape. 
 A major concern of COVID-19 is immune escape. While T cells are implicated in protection against severe disease, direct evaluation of their capacity to specifically target SARS-CoV-2 variants remains limited. We aim to narrow this gap by profiling the ability of CD8+ T cells to recognize SARS-CoV-2 mutations after vaccination and observe a high degree of phenotype and repertoire diversity. To better understand the breadth of antigen repertoire coverage, we interrogate the ability of SARS-CoV-2 specific TCRs to bind all point mutations of the immunodominant HLA-A2:S269-277 epitope. While mutation space coverage is surprisingly vast, specific substitutions are not recognized by the vaccine-elicited repertoire. Structural analyses reveal a TCR sequence-based antigen recognition limitation intrinsic to vaccination. Further investigation reveals that this repertoire ‘hole’ is not present in the naive repertoire, suggesting future immune escape through these potential escape mutations could be relieved by modifications to vaccines. It remains elusive whether the T cell repertoire will cover all point mutations of a major epitope. The authors here show that COVID vaccine–induced CD8⁺ T cells detect most YLQ peptide variants except R5, but naïve T cells fill this gap by responding to R5 despite abundant WT-specific cells, ensuring broad coverage to prevent viral immune-escape.

explanation: 该论文主要研究高温下氧化钴热化学材料在氧化还原循环中的三维形貌与化学演变，属于材料科学领域。虽涉及同步辐射X射线成像技术，但未涉及大气环境监测、卫星观测或污染物分析，核心关注材料退化机制而非环境遥感应用。
topic_words: ['Operando synchrotron X-ray imaging', 'cobalt oxide', 'thermal redox cycles', 'micro/nano particles', 'pore formation']
authors: Yuxiang Peng;Lyu Zhou;Madeline Van Winkle;Cheng-Chu Chung;Youyang Zhao;John Mangum;Xianghui Xiao;Katherine Jungjohann;Judith Vidal;Shuang Cui;Mingyuan Ge;Yu-chen Karen Chen-Wiegart
title: Operando X-ray imaging reveals size-dependent evolution of cobalt oxide thermochemical material during thermal redox cycles
abstract:
Using operando synchrotron X-ray imaging, the study reveals 3D morphological and chemical changes of thermochemical particles during redox cycles, uncovering degradation mechanisms and insights for improved thermal energy materials. 
 Multivalent metal oxides are promising thermochemical materials (TCMs) for energy storage and conversion owing to their high energy density, air compatibility, and high-temperature stability. Co3O4 serves as a model system for examining particle-size- and structure-dependent redox behavior. While particle size and porosity are known to affect performance, their interplay and the kinetics of pore formation during cycling remain unclear. Here we show the chemical and 3D morphological evolution of Co3O4 micro- and nanoparticles during redox cycles at 800–900 °C using thermal analysis, in-situ synchrotron transmission X-ray microscopy (TXM), and scanning electron microscopy. Thermal analysis shows that nanoparticles re-oxidize more rapidly than microparticles at 800 °C. In-situ nanotomography and chemical imaging reveals that nanoparticles undergo redox conversion without forming internal pores, whereas microparticles develop isolated porosity during reduction. These pores persist through re-oxidation, correlating to a lower conversion rate in subsequent cycles. Our results demonstrate distinct degradation kinetics in Co3O4 micro- and nanoparticles, underscoring the critical role of particle size and porosity in redox performance and informing strategies to enhance the long-term efficiency of metal oxide TCMs. Using operando synchrotron X-ray imaging, the study reveals 3D morphological and chemical changes of thermochemical particles during redox cycles, uncovering degradation mechanisms and insights for improved thermal energy materials.

explanation: 该论文主要研究非晶态材料中玻色峰（BP）的动量依赖性和空间相关性，通过中子非弹性散射、分子动力学模拟等方法，探讨BP与材料静态结构因子的关系。玻色峰与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、大气成分分析）无直接关联。论文关注的是固体物理中的非晶态材料动态特性，而非大气环境监测或遥感技术本身。
topic_words: ['boson peak', 'amorphous materials', 'inelastic neutron scattering', 'molecular dynamics', 'spatial correlation']
authors: X. Y. Li;H. P. Zhang;S. Lan;D. L. Abernathy;C. H. Hu;L. R. Fan;M. Z. Li;X.-L. Wang
title: Spatial correlation at the boson peak frequency in amorphous materials
abstract:
Photonic time crystals (PTCs) have unveiled unusual band structures and phenomena due to temporal modulation of optical properties. Here, the authors address non-Hermitian features of PTCs within a purely Hermitian Hamiltonian description, bridging classical and quantum approaches. 
 The Boson peak (BP), an excess of vibrational density of states, is ubiquitous for amorphous materials and is believed to hold the key to understanding the dynamics of glass and glass transition. Previous studies have established an energy scale for the BP, which is ~ 1-10 meV or ~ THz in frequency. However, so far, little is known about the momentum dependence or spatial correlation of the BP. Here, we report the observation of the BP in model Zr-Cu-Al metallic glasses over a wide range of momentum transfer, using inelastic neutron scattering, heat capacity, Raman scattering measurements, and molecular dynamics (MD) simulations. The BP energy is largely dispersionless; however, the BP intensity is found to scale with the static structure factor. Additional MD simulations with a generic Lennard-Jones potential confirm the same. Based on these results, an analytical expression for the dynamic structure factor is formulated for the BP excitation. Further analysis of the simulated disordered structures suggests that the BP is related to local structure fluctuations (e.g., in shear strain). Our results offer insights into the nature of the BP and provide guidance for the development of theories of amorphous materials. Photonic time crystals (PTCs) have unveiled unusual band structures and phenomena due to temporal modulation of optical properties. Here, the authors address non-Hermitian features of PTCs within a purely Hermitian Hamiltonian description, bridging classical and quantum approaches.

explanation: 摘要主要探讨人工智能中基于自由能原则的鲁棒决策模型（DR-FREE），强调在训练与环境不一致时的模型适应性。尽管提到环境变化（training-environment ambiguities），但未涉及遥感技术、卫星观测、大气成分分析或空气质量管理等具体领域的关键技术或应用场景。研究属于机器学习理论，与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
authors: Allahkaram Shafiei;Hozefa Jesawada;Karl Friston;Giovanni Russo
title: Distributionally robust free energy principle for decision-making
abstract:
Autonomous agents can misbehave when training and environment conditions become inconsistent. Here, the authors introduce a Distributionally Robust Free Energy model that embeds robustness directly into the agent decision-making mechanisms through free energy minimization. 
 Despite their groundbreaking performance, autonomous agents can misbehave when training and environmental conditions become inconsistent, with minor mismatches leading to undesirable behaviors or even catastrophic failures. Robustness towards these training-environment ambiguities is a core requirement for intelligent agents and its fulfillment is a long-standing challenge towards their real-world deployments. Here, we introduce a Distributionally Robust Free Energy model (DR-FREE) that instills this core property by design. Combining a robust extension of the free energy principle with a resolution engine, DR-FREE wires robustness into the agent decision-making mechanisms. Across benchmark experiments, DR-FREE enables the agents to complete the task even when, in contrast, state-of-the-art models fail. This milestone may inspire both deployments in multi-agent settings and, at a perhaps deeper level, the quest for an explanation of how natural agents – with little or no training – survive in capricious environments. Autonomous agents can misbehave when training and environment conditions become inconsistent. Here, the authors introduce a Distributionally Robust Free Energy model that embeds robustness directly into the agent decision-making mechanisms through free energy minimization.

explanation: 该论文研究中性粒细胞亚群在结直肠癌肝转移中的作用机制，属于生物医学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、空气质量监测、污染物分析等）无直接关联。文中未提及遥感技术、传感器、卫星数据或大气环境参数分析。
authors: Zhuoqing Xu;Haoran Feng;Wenqing Feng;Yuchen Zhang;Jianting Huo;Zifeng Xu;Fangqian Chen;Han Gao;Zeping Lv;Wangyi Liu;Abudumaimaitijiang Tuersun;Suyue Yu;Wenchang Li;Yaping Zong;Xiaohui Shen;Xi Cheng;Jingkun Zhao;Aiguo Lu
title: Agonist signaling drives neutrophil subpopulations to promote/inhibit colorectal cancer liver metastasis
abstract:
Liver metastasis remains a leading cause of colorectal cancer mortality. This study identifies different neutrophil subtypes involved in metastasis, highlighting therapeutic potential of neutrophil subset targeting to inhibit tumor progression. 
 Liver metastasis is a primary cause of death in colorectal cancer, yet the role of immune cells called neutrophils in this process remains complex. In this study, we identify three distinct neutrophil subtypes: anti-tumor high-density neutrophils, pro-tumor mature low-density neutrophils, and immature low-density neutrophils. Here we show that tumor-derived GM-CSF converts anti-tumor neutrophils into a pro-tumor state via the AKT–NF-κB–NFAT5 signaling axis. These activated neutrophils, when further stimulated by CXCR2 ligands, release web-like structures known as neutrophil extracellular traps which promote cancer spread by enhancing cancer cell growth, suppressing immune responses, and preparing the liver for metastasis. Importantly, we demonstrate that using antibodies depleting neutrophils or drugs inhibiting their pro-tumor activity effectively reduces liver metastasis in mice. Our work defines specific neutrophil subsets as key drivers of cancer progression and highlights their therapeutic potential in preventing metastatic spread. Liver metastasis remains a leading cause of colorectal cancer mortality. This study identifies different neutrophil subtypes involved in metastasis, highlighting therapeutic potential of neutrophil subset targeting to inhibit tumor progression.

explanation: 该论文专注于通过非线性相位检索和多重倾斜HRTEM焦域序列提升电子显微成像的分辨率与剂量效率，应用于纳米颗粒（Co3O4）的成像分析。研究内容属于材料科学和生物结构成像领域，未涉及大气环境监测（如卫星观测、污染物遥感分析、大气成分解析等技术或应用场景），因此与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
authors: Juhyeok Lee;Samuel W. Song;Min Gee Cho;Georgios Varnavides;Stephanie M. Ribet;Colin Ophus;Mary C. Scott;Michael L. Whittaker
title: PhaseT3M: 3D imaging at 1.6 Å resolution via electron cryo-tomography with nonlinear phase retrieval
abstract:
Electron tomography enables high-resolution 3D imaging but is limited by radiation sensitivity. Here, the authors demonstrate a phase retrieval method using multiple tilted HRTEM focal series, achieving 1.6 Å resolution with improved dose efficiency and elemental sensitivity. 
 Electron cryo-tomography (cryo-ET) enables 3D imaging of complex, radiation-sensitive structures with molecular detail. However, image contrast from the interference of scattered electrons is nonlinear with atomic density and multiple scattering further complicates interpretation. These effects degrade resolution, particularly in conventional reconstruction algorithms, which assume linearity. Particle averaging can reduce such issues but is unsuitable for heterogeneous or dynamic samples ubiquitous in biology, chemistry, and materials sciences. Here, we develop a phase retrieval-based cryo-ET method, PhaseT3M. We experimentally demonstrate its application to an approximately 7 nm Co3O4 nanoparticle on an approximately 30 nm carbon substrate, achieving a maximum resolution of 1.6 Å, surpassing conventional limits using standard cryo-TEM equipment. PhaseT3M uses a multislice model for multiple scattering and Bayesian optimization for alignment and computational aberration correction, with a positivity constraint to recover ‘missing wedge’ information. Applied directly to biological particles, it enhances reconstruction quality and reduces artifacts, establishing a standard for routine 3D imaging with phase contrast. Electron tomography enables high-resolution 3D imaging but is limited by radiation sensitivity. Here, the authors demonstrate a phase retrieval method using multiple tilted HRTEM focal series, achieving 1.6 Å resolution with improved dose efficiency and elemental sensitivity.

explanation: 该论文研究大气中黑碳气溶胶的质量吸收截面（MACBC），这是将光学测量（如卫星遥感）与污染物质量浓度关联的关键参数。论文分析了采样地点、测量波长、仪器误差等因素对MACBC的影响，直接涉及卫星观测、空气质量监测和大气成分分析的技术方法，与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['black carbon', 'mass absorption cross-section', 'aerosol measurements', 'atmospheric aging', 'instrumentation calibration']
authors: Eija Asmi;Timothy A. Sipkens;Jorge Saturno;John Backman;Konstantina Vasilatou;Ernest Weingartner;Alejandro Keller;Krzysztof Ciupek;Thomas Müller;Arun Babu Suja;Griša Močnik;Luka Drinovec;Konstantinos Eleftheriadis;Maria I. Gini;Andreas Nowak;Joel C. Corbin
title: Mass absorption cross-section of ambient black carbon aerosols - a review
abstract:
Mass absorption cross-section of ambient black carbon aerosols - a review 
 An accurate assessment of black carbon (BC) climate and health impacts requires knowledge of its mass absorption cross-section (MACBC) – a parameter linking optical and mass measurements. The mean MACBC for freshly emitted soot typically spans a narrow range of 8 ± 1 m2 g⁻1 at 550 nm1,2 but is modified by subsequent atmospheric aging. Determination of MACBC requires simultaneous measurements of aerosol light-absorption coefficient (βabs) and BC mass. Here, we compile 230 measured MACBC values from 80 atmospheric studies and explore the effects of sampling location, study duration, instrumentation, and measurement wavelength. The compiled data set shows a broad variability in MACBC values (a factor of about 200%). We conclude that this variability is attributable to a combination of the above-mentioned effects with additional instrumental uncertainties (e.g., cross-sensitivities and/or inadequate instrument calibration). The current state of knowledge does not support the use of simplistic generalizations or assumptions about MACBC in the atmosphere, motivating a recommendation to further improve and standardize measurement practices.

explanation: 该论文主要研究基于视觉引导的着陆轨迹重建技术，用于月球着陆点定位和地质分析（如陨石坑形态测量和土壤矿物学）。其技术核心聚焦于月球探测的影像处理和机器学习算法，而非大气环境监测、卫星气溶胶反演或空气质量评估等技术领域。因此，与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
topic_words: ['vision-guided trajectory reconstruction', 'descent imagery', 'deep learning-enhanced landmark matching']
authors: Shihao Shu;Liqun Lin;Bingxu Hou;Fangyi Cheng;Dingquan Xue;Chenfeng Hou;Yong Lai;Cai Meng;Lu Li;Yan Li;Xiangzhi Bai
title: Intelligent vision-guided trajectory reconstruction enables rapid localization and characterization of the Chang’E-6 landing site
abstract:
A high-fidelity reconstruction of the Chang’E-6 landing trajectory based on descent imagery can rapidly and accurately locate the landing site and be used for geological analyses including crater morphometry and regolith mineralogy. 
 The Chang’E-6 (CE-6) mission’s first lunar farside samples return advances understanding of lunar evolution. This achievement highlights the necessity of rapid landing-trajectory reconstruction and precise landing-site characterization for mission execution. We present an intelligent vision-guided framework for lunar exploration, demonstrating that high-fidelity trajectory reconstruction can simultaneously enhance landing site localization accuracy and geological analysis precision. Our approach integrates: high-precision trajectory reconstruction from descent imagery, rapid localization utilizing deep learning-enhanced landmark matching achieving 0.90 m landing-site accuracy for Chang’E-6, and physically constrained geological analysis with visual rectification. By correcting camera distortions via pose parameters, we improve crater morphometry and surface age dating through orthorectified CSFD measurements. Our results reveal late-stage volcanism ( ~ 855 Ma) in Apollo crater ejecta, challenging early farside magmatic cessation models. Furthermore, we identify pristine anorthosite-pyroxene assemblages critical for probing lunar mantle differentiation. This work establishes an intelligent vision-guided approach to computational photogrammetry for extraterrestrial sample-return missions. A high-fidelity reconstruction of the Chang’E-6 landing trajectory based on descent imagery can rapidly and accurately locate the landing site and be used for geological analyses including crater morphometry and regolith mineralogy.

explanation: 该论文研究深海沉积物中微生物铁循环对稀土元素富集的影响，涉及地球化学、磁性分析和显微技术，主要关注海洋地质和微生物地球化学过程，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、空气质量监测等）无直接关联。
topic_words: ['rare earth elements', 'microbial iron cycling', 'biogenic magnetite', 'geochemical analysis', 'pore water']
authors: Pengcong Wang;Deng Liu;Peyman Babakhani;Mingyu Zhao;Yangtao Zhu;Jiayi Ma;Ganglan Zhang;Chutong Liu;Jun Cao;Fang Chen;Xiaoqiang Yang;Yinan Deng
title: Microbial iron cycling illuminates the biological contribution and potential climate drivers of deep-sea rare earth element enrichment
abstract:
Microbial iron cycling can enhance the accumulation of rare earth elements and yttrium in host minerals by facilitating their release from iron oxides back into the pore water, according to an integrated geochemical, magnetic, and microscopic analysis. 
 Deep-sea sediments enriched in rare earth elements represent important potential resources and paleoceanographic archives. The transfer of these elements from marine particles (e.g., Fe-Mn (oxyhydr)oxides or organic matter) to phosphate phases is essential for their enrichment during early diagenesis. However, the biogeochemical processes driving this transfer remain unresolved. Here, we investigate how microbial reductive diagenesis influences rare earth element enrichment in deep-sea sediments of the northwestern Pacific. By integrating geochemical, magnetic, and microscopic analyses of iron biogeochemical cycling and its signature mineral, biogenic magnetite, we demonstrate that microbial reduction drives the post-depositional mineralization of sinking marine particles. This process releases rare earth elements into porewater, thereby promoting their uptake into bioapatite or authigenic apatite. This mechanism was likely enhanced during past global cooling events that increased ocean productivity. Our findings provide valuable insights for tracing microbial contributions to deep-sea rare earth element enrichment and for investigating their underlying drivers. Microbial iron cycling can enhance the accumulation of rare earth elements and yttrium in host minerals by facilitating their release from iron oxides back into the pore water, according to an integrated geochemical, magnetic, and microscopic analysis.

explanation: 该论文主要研究长江流域水库对磷素汇的驱动作用及其对磷素输出的影响，采用耦合的陆-水模型分析磷素在河流、水库及沿海海洋中的迁移规律。研究内容集中在水文系统、生物地球化学模型和河流管理领域，未涉及大气环境遥感技术（如卫星传感器监测空气污染物、大气成分分析或遥感算法），因此与题目要求的技术关联性较弱。
authors: Zhimin Zhou;Yan Sun;Zhaoxue Yu;Shushi Peng;Pierre Regnier;Maoyuan Feng;Jinfeng Chang;Zun Yin;Haicheng Zhang;Yang Gao;Huiwang Gao
title: Dam-driven phosphorus sinks reversed the anticipated increase in phosphorus export from the Yangtze River Basin
abstract:
Dam-assisted phosphorus retention occurs in a considerable amount along the terrestrial aquatic continuum within the Yangtze River Basin, suggesting it be included in terrestrial biogeochemical and watershed models 
 Excessive anthropogenic phosphorus inputs create nutrient surpluses along the terrestrial-aquatic continuum, triggering worldwide water quality challenges. River damming enhances phosphorus retention within river networks and redistributes it among reservoirs, rivers, and coastal oceans. However, the role of reservoirs as phosphorus sinks and their effect on phosphorus export to estuaries remain poorly quantified. We developed a coupled terrestrial-aquatic model to trace phosphorus fate in the highly dammed and fertilized Yangtze River Basin from 1980 to 2018. Our results show that cumulative dam-driven phosphorus retention reached $${4.7}_{3.7}^{5.5}$$ teragrams of phosphorus (median and range), exceeding the cumulative rise in phosphorus loading ($${2.1}_{1.3}^{2.9}$$ teragrams of phosphorus), thereby reversing the anticipated rise in phosphorus export to the estuary. Notably, 40% of dam-induced retention occurred during 2011–2018, despite fertilizer use plateauing around 2010. This strengthened inland water phosphorus sink arises not only from increased damming but also from the continuous release of previously stored phosphorus in terrestrial ecosystems, highlighting the key role of legacy effects in controlling the phosphorus temporal dynamics. Dam-assisted phosphorus retention occurs in a considerable amount along the terrestrial aquatic continuum within the Yangtze River Basin, suggesting it be included in terrestrial biogeochemical and watershed models

explanation: 该论文虽涉及空气温度（大气环境要素）对河流水质的影响，但其研究方法基于面板数据分析（276个城市2014-2020年数据），未使用遥感技术（如卫星观测、传感器监测等）。研究重点在于温度与水质关系的统计建模，而非大气环境参数的遥感反演或监测技术，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联性较弱。
authors: Kehan Liang;Litiao Hu;Zongwei Ma;Shenyuan Huang;Miaomiao Liu;Wen Fang;Jianxun Yang;Jun Bi
title: Non-linear relationships between air temperature and river water quality revealed by a panel dataset of 276 Chinese cities
abstract:
Both single-day high temperatures and heatwaves significantly increase river permanganate index, worsening organic compound pollution, and contribute to quality-based water scarcity, according to an analysis of air temperature on river water quality in 276 Chinese cities from 2014- 2020. 
 The impact of air temperature on water quality is typically mediated through its influence on water temperature, evaporation, and physicochemical processes. A comprehensive understanding of air temperature’s effects on river pollution is imperative, particularly given rising water scarcity and the increasingly frequent extreme temperature events in China. Here, we employ the fixed effects model to estimate the effects of air temperature on river water quality and elucidate inverted U-shaped responses through 276 Chinese cities from 2014-2020. Our results demonstrate that both single-day high temperatures (>37 °C) and heatwaves (four consecutive days above 35 °C) significantly increase river permanganate index (CODMn) concentration, worsening organic pollution. Additionally, these extreme temperature events contribute over 67% and 10% to quality-based water scarcity, presenting considerable challenges to water withdrawals in cities. Our findings necessitate incorporating temperature-related considerations into contemporary and prospective river governance, contributing to the development of targeted adaptation strategies and enhancing water resource management. Both single-day high temperatures and heatwaves significantly increase river permanganate index, worsening organic compound pollution, and contribute to quality-based water scarcity, according to an analysis of air temperature on river water quality in 276 Chinese cities from 2014- 2020.

explanation: 该论文研究的是地球早期大陆 crust 的形成机制及其与地质动力学转变（约30亿年前）的关系，主要涉及热力学-地球化学建模、矿物水合分析及俯冲带过程。其核心关注地质构造演化与岩石类型多样性，未提及遥感技术、卫星观测、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演等大气环境遥感相关的研究内容或技术手段。因此，相关性较低。
authors: Hairuo Wang;Keda Cai;Min Sun;Wei-Ran Li;Ming Chen;Xiao-Ping Xia
title: Diverse genesis of early Earth’s continental crust hints the geodynamic transition at about 3.0 Gyrs ago
abstract:
Pressure plays a primary role in controlling the formation and compositional diversity of tonalite-trondhjemite-granodiorite suites, with “high-pressure” variants derived from fluid-fluxed melting during subduction, recording the onset of global subduction at ~3.0 Ga, according to thermodynamic-geochemical modeling and mineral hygrometry analysis. 
 Tonalite-trondhjemite-granodiorite suites, dominating Earth’s early continental crust, likely formed by partial melting of hydrated metabasalt, but the specific conditions and mechanisms remain poorly constrained. Here, we conduct thermodynamic-geochemical modeling to systematically compare the roles that pressure, bulk H2O content, and source rock composition play in shaping these ancient rocks. Accordingly, we assess their optimal forming conditions, which are further validated by magmatic H2O contents retrieved from the apatite and zircon crystals of tonalite-trondhjemite-granodiorite suites. Our results highlight that pressure is the first-order factor controlling the formation and compositional diversity of these rock suites. Those with “high-pressure” geochemical characteristics are derived from fluid-fluxed melting at 14 – 16 kbar, a process readily explained by subduction rather than intraplate geodynamic regime. Furthermore, the temporal and spatial distributions of “high-pressure” variants, coupled with those of arc-like basalts, suggest subduction that likely initiated as a local phenomenon and transitioned to a global-scale process by 3.0 Ga. Pressure plays a primary role in controlling the formation and compositional diversity of tonalite-trondhjemite-granodiorite suites, with “high-pressure” variants derived from fluid-fluxed melting during subduction, recording the onset of global subduction at ~3.0 Ga, according to thermodynamic-geochemical modeling and mineral hygrometry analysis.

explanation: 该论文主要研究2023-24厄尔尼诺事件对全球气温的影响，通过分析地表气温和海洋热含量数据，使用统计模型和格林函数方法探讨升温原因。虽然涉及海洋热含量等数据，但未明确提及卫星遥感技术（如卫星传感器型号）、大气成分反演算法或空气质量管理等具体远程传感领域。研究重点在于气候模式分析而非遥感技术的应用或创新。
topic_words: ['surface air temperature', 'ocean heat content', 'Green’s Function method']
authors: Ning Jiang;Congwen Zhu;Michael J. McPhaden;Zeng-Zhen Hu;Tao Lian;Chen Zhou;Deliang Chen
title: Atypical warming pattern of strong 2023-24 El Niño boosts global temperatures to new 1.5 °C record
abstract:
The 2023-24 El Niño event led global mean surface temperatures to surpass 1.5 degrees above pre-industrial levels, according to analysis of surface air temperature and ocean heat content data. 
 During the 2023-24 El Niño, the July 2023–June 2024 average global mean surface temperature peaked at 1.58 °C above pre-industrial levels, associated with a record 0.36 °C year-over-year rise. Here we use statistical models and a Green’s Function method to explore the causes for this rise. We show that sea surface temperature accounts for ~92% of the interannual warming, highlighting the critical role of El Niño diversity. Unlike typical El Niños, dual tropical Pacific warming centers in 2023-24 and an eastward-extended North Atlantic jet stream synergistically amplified sea surface temperatures across tropical basins, accelerating the pace of global warming. From an energy balance perspective, ocean heat content accumulated during the preceding La Niña and a continuous increase in absorbed shortwave radiation over the ocean drove sea surface temperature rise. Accelerated warming may push the climate system closer to critical tipping points, emphasizing the need for enhanced monitoring, mitigation, and adaptation strategies. The 2023-24 El Niño event led global mean surface temperatures to surpass 1.5 degrees above pre-industrial levels, according to analysis of surface air temperature and ocean heat content data.

explanation: 该论文通过花粉分析法和植被 openness 定量重建研究早期更新世人类进化，主要关注生态景观（如植被结构、开阔度）与人类行为适应的关系，未涉及大气遥感技术（如卫星观测、传感器、算法等）的具体应用或方法。其核心是考古生态学与古气候研究，而非直接关联大气环境遥感技术领域。
authors: Baoshuo Fan;Yuecong Li;Fagang Wang;Jiaxing Yang;Zhen Zhang;Qinghai Xu;Qingzhen Hao;Yawen Ge;Bing Li;Deke Xu;Fei Xie;Chenglong Deng;Houyuan Lu
title: Relatively open vegetation landscapes promoted early Pleistocene hominin evolution
abstract:
Relatively open vegetation landscapes during the early Pleistocene facilitated hominins’ evolution, with resource abundance, accessibility, and mobility playing crucial roles, according to pollen analysis and quantitative reconstruction of vegetation openness. 
 Vegetation structure and landscape openness are key ecological factors influencing human behavioural and cultural adaptation strategies. However, there is ongoing debate and lack of quantitative assessment about which vegetation landscape and openness levels were more conducive to hominin dispersal during the early Pleistocene. Here, we selected the early Pleistocene Majuangou archaeological site in China, which is the earliest site in the Nihewan Basin with reliable stratigraphic chronology and abundant archaeological materials, as the research object. We conducted pollen analysis across eight artefact layers and the natural sediments (1.75–1.29 Ma), and carried out the first quantitative reconstruction of vegetation openness. The results demonstrate that vegetation openness in the artefact layers was predominantly between 60% and 90%, while layers with vegetation openness below 50% or above 90% had either no or very few artefacts. The global comparison revealed that hominins’ preference for relatively open habitats was a consistent global pattern, challenging the view that relatively closed forest vegetation landscapes were more conducive to their dispersal. Our findings suggest that enhanced resource abundance, accessibility and mobility in these environments facilitated both hominin dispersal and cultural development, highlighting the pivotal role of relatively open vegetation landscapes in shaping hominin evolution. Relatively open vegetation landscapes during the early Pleistocene facilitated hominins’ evolution, with resource abundance, accessibility, and mobility playing crucial roles, according to pollen analysis and quantitative reconstruction of vegetation openness.

explanation: 该论文研究海底玄武岩大断层的破裂模式转变（慢滑移至动态破裂），通过三轴剪切实验分析微观纹理演变，涉及地质力学和地球物理过程。其核心术语如'basaltic megathrusts'（玄武岩大断层）、'triaxial shear experiments'（三轴剪切实验）属于地质工程领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星传感器监测气溶胶、温室气体等）无直接关联。论文未提及遥感技术、大气污染物或卫星观测相关方法。
authors: Rui Huang;Mengke An;Luanxiao Zhao;Derek Elsworth;Chris Marone;Jianhang Lv;Shutian Cao;Qiong Wang;Hehua Zhu;Quan Gan;Fengshou Zhang
title: Signatures of localization control transition between rupture styles on basaltic megathrusts
abstract:
Evolution of slow slip to dynamic rupture on seabed megathrusts in basalt can be explained by strain localization and a transition to strain weakening behaviour encoded as a microtextural signature in triaxial shear experiments on oceanic basalt gouge. 
 Megathrust faults at subduction zones slip at a broad spectrum of rates from slow creep (centimeters per year) to dynamic rupture (meters per second) with large excess fluid pressures implicated as a control on nucleation style. We report friction measurements on oceanic basalt gouges (IODP Expedition 368X) at elevated temperatures (150°C−450°C), stresses (150 MPa) and large fluid overpressures (30-120 MPa) to represent conditions along the descending slab and to link observed rheology to microtextural evolution. With reducing effective stress, slip instabilities are first manifest as slow-slip and evolve through dynamic stick-slip as a result of reduced shear zone width. This transition in rupture style is driven by an increase in effective fault stiffness k’c and decrease in nucleation length L. Increased intergranular pressure dissolution at elevated effective stress mediates the shear localization width, controls the dynamics of strain localization, and leaves a structurally discernable fingerprint. Our results imply that effective stress-controlled mass transfer, together with strain localization, dictates the styles of instability nucleation manifest as slow earthquakes rationally evolving into dynamic megathrust ruptures. Evolution of slow slip to dynamic rupture on seabed megathrusts in basalt can be explained by strain localization and a transition to strain weakening behaviour encoded as a microtextural signature in triaxial shear experiments on oceanic basalt gouge.

explanation: 该论文专注于通过地面激光扫描（terrestrial laser scanning）快速重建树木体积（tree volume reconstruction），属于近地或地面遥感技术，主要应用于森林资源监测领域。虽然激光扫描技术本身是遥感手段，但研究内容未涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、气体成分、卫星观测数据等），也未讨论与大气环境相关的分析或应用，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Timothy Devereux;Thomas Lowe;Joshua Rivory;Rafael Bohn Reckziegel;Kim Calders;Raja Ram Aryal;Glen Eaton;Zane Cooper;Shaun Levick;Stuart Phinn;William Woodgate
title: RayExtract: A fast, scalable method for tree volume reconstruction from terrestrial laser scanning

explanation: 该研究聚焦森林土壤湿度和植被光学深度的L波段前向建模与反演，主要涉及地表遥感和植被参数反演技术，未直接涉及大气环境要素（如空气质量、气溶胶、大气成分等）的监测或分析。虽然L波段辐射计与大气遥感技术存在部分重叠，但论文核心目标为森林地表参数而非大气环境。
topic_words: ['L波段辐射计', '森林土壤湿度', '植被光学深度']
authors: Andreas Colliander;Mike Schwank;Yiwen Zhou;Mehmet Kurum;Cristina Vittucci;Leung Tsang;Alex Roy;Aaron Berg
title: A review of forward modelling and retrieval approaches for forest soil moisture and vegetation optical depth using L-band radiometry

explanation: 该研究基于Sentinel-2卫星数据，利用地表反射率和光合有效辐射参数估算GPP（植被生物量生产），属于植被遥感与大气环境监测交叉领域。GPP是植被与大气碳交换的关键参数，通过卫星遥感进行高分辨率估算，直接服务于大气成分分析和碳循环研究。
authors: Shaoyu Wang;Youngryel Ryu;Benjamin Dechant;Helin Zhang;Huaize Feng;Jeongho Lee;Changhyun Choi
title: GPP-net: a robust high-resolution GPP estimation network for Sentinel-2 using only surface reflectance and photosynthetically active radiation

explanation: 该论文基于卫星偏振观测，提出了一种协同的超级椭球粒子形态与冰云光学厚度反演方法。其中'冰云光学厚度'直接关联大气环境遥感中的云物理参数反演，而'卫星偏振观测'是典型的环境遥感技术手段，同时涉及气溶胶粒子形态反演（与大气环境监测相关）。
authors: Yizhen Meng;Lei Bi;Wei Han
title: A synergistic super-ellipsoidal particle shape and ice cloud optical thickness retrieval method based on satellite polarimetric observations

explanation: 该论文使用高光谱传感器OCI/PACE对大西洋马尾藻进行观测，OCI（Ozone and Climate Assessment）和PACE（Plankton, Air, and Climate Ecosystems Satellite）均为卫星大气环境监测技术，涉及大气成分分析和遥感技术，符合 atmospheric environmental remote sensing 的核心范畴。
authors: Lin Qi;Menghua Wang;Chuanmin Hu;Yuyuan Xie;Brian B. Barnes
title: Hyperspectral OCI/PACE observations of the Atlantic Sargassum

explanation: 该论文主要研究西班牙半岛森林结构长期变化，利用激光雷达（lidar）与光学传感器（optical sensors）的协同观测。虽然lidar技术可应用于大气环境监测（如气溶胶反演），但本文重点在于森林垂直结构、冠层密度等陆域植被参数，属于地形遥感和森林资源调查范畴，而非直接针对大气环境质量、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: M. Tanase;J.P. Martini;P. Miranda;D. Garcia;V. Wilke;S. Miguel;C. Mihai;J. Diez;S. Natal;D. San Martin;P. Ruiz-Benito
title: Long-term forest structure trends in the peninsular Spain from lidar-optical sensors synergies

explanation: 该论文聚焦于通过最小预测集获取全球表层浮游植物群落结构，主要涉及海洋生态学和生物遥感预测，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星大气成分分析、气溶胶反演、空气质量监测等）无直接关联，其技术路径和研究对象属于海洋学范畴。
authors: Xueyin Li;Shuguo Chen;Junwei Wang;Qing Zhu
title: Retrieval of global surface phytoplankton community structure using a minimal set of predictors

explanation: 该论文基于MODIS-Aqua卫星20余年的观测数据，构建了高精度的遥感反射率数据库。MODIS-Aqua卫星是大气环境监测的重要遥感平台，其数据可直接用于气溶胶反演、大气组分分析及空气质量评估。数据库的长期连续性和高分辨率特性，为大气遥感技术的关键参数获取和算法开发提供了基础数据支撑，因此与大气遥感技术密切相关。
authors: Longteng Zhao;Zhongping Lee;Xiaolong Yu;Tianhao Wang;Daosheng Wang;Shaoling Shang
title: Highest quality remote sensing reflectance database compiled from 20+ years of MODIS-aqua measurements

explanation: 该研究通过合成孔径雷达（SAR）与光学遥感数据的融合，解决了大云量覆盖下卫星影像清晰度不足的问题。这种技术能提升大气环境监测中卫星影像的可用性，例如支持气溶胶分布分析、地表覆盖评估等，符合大气遥感技术的研究范畴。
authors: Yu Xia;Wei He;Liangpei Zhang;Hongyan Zhang
title: Began+: Leveraging bi-temporal SAR-optical data fusion to reconstruct clear-sky satellite imagery under large cloud cover

explanation: 该论文聚焦于卫星图像时间序列的多分辨率融合技术，直接应用于Landsat-8/9和Sentinel-2卫星数据。这类技术对大气环境监测至关重要，因其能整合不同空间分辨率和时间序列的数据，提升气溶胶反演、空气质量评估等大气成分分析精度。研究涉及卫星传感器（Landsat-8/9、Sentinel-2）和关键技术（多分辨率融合、时空注意力机制），与大气环境遥感的核心应用场景高度契合。
authors: Julien Michel;Jordi Inglada
title: Temporal attention multi-resolution fusion of satellite image time-series, applied to Landsat-8/9 and Sentinel-2: all bands, any time, at best spatial resolution

explanation: 该研究聚焦于通过卫星微波测量估算海面泡沫覆盖率及有效泡沫层厚度，虽然涉及卫星遥感技术，但核心对象是海洋表面的泡沫现象，属于海洋环境监测范畴，而非直接针对大气环境（如空气质量、大气成分或气溶胶反演）的遥感技术应用。
topic_words: ['sea surface foam', 'microwave measurements', 'satellite observations', 'effective foam layer thickness']
authors: Xuchen Jin;Xianqiang He;Palanisamy Shanmugam;Yan Bai;Jianyun Ying;Qiankun Zhu;Yaqi Zhao;Delu Pan
title: Estimation of sea surface foam coverage and effective foam layer thickness from satellite microwave measurements

explanation: 该论文研究无人机激光雷达（UAV lidar）提取的灌木结构指数与地上生物量估算，属于植被遥感或林业遥感的范畴，未明确涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、气溶胶、温室气体等）的监测、分析或遥感技术。因此与大气环境遥感技术关联性较弱。
authors: Jiaming Wu;Yaxin Wang;Liang Hong;Bin Sun;Zhenping He;Zejiang Li;Zhijie Ma
title: A novel UAV lidar-derived shrub structural index for estimating above-ground biomass

explanation: 该研究主要评估LiDAR在不同仪器配置下对冠层间隙分数的提取性能，属于植被遥感或地表参数反演领域。虽然LiDAR技术本身与遥感相关，但冠层间隙分数更多涉及森林结构分析，而非直接关联大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星观测或大气成分分析）。
authors: Yi Li;Hao Tang;Shanshan Wei;Donghui Xie;Xihan Mu;Guangjian Yan
title: Performance assessment of canopy gap fraction retrieval using multiple airborne LiDAR instrument configurations

explanation: 该论文明确使用卫星遥感技术（satellite remote sensing）作为研究森林动态（forest dynamics）和边缘效应（edge effects）的证据来源，属于大气环境遥感监测的范畴。尽管核心主题是森林生态学，但其方法与卫星观测技术直接相关。
authors: Jinlong Chen;Zeng Cui;Zhiyao Tang
title: Edge effects on forest dynamics in China from 2000 to 2020: Evidence from satellite remote sensing

explanation: 该论文研究基于多传感器（GMI、AMSR2、MWRIs）的微波地表发射率全球反演，微波遥感技术在大气环境监测中常用于地表参数与大气成分（如湿度、温度）的联合反演，或支撑气溶胶分布模型。虽然标题聚焦地表发射率，但其多传感器融合方法可间接应用于大气环境参数反演，因此相关。
authors: Jiheng Hu;Rui Li;Peng Zhang;Yu Wang;Shengli Wu;Husi Letu;Fuzhong Weng
title: Global retrieval of harmonized microwave land surface emissivity leveraging multi-sensor measurements from GMI, AMSR2 and MWRIs

explanation: 该论文主要基于Sentinel-2卫星影像通过Google Earth Engine构建全球10米分辨率的海岸线数据集，其核心目标是海岸线测绘而非直接涉及大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演）。虽然使用了卫星遥感技术，但研究主题更偏向地理信息系统的应用，与大气环境领域的关联较弱。
authors: Yuanqiang Duan;Arturo Sanchez-Azofeifa;Chunpeng Chen;Bo Tian;Xing Li;Dhritiraj Sengupta;Yunxuan Zhou
title: S2Coast-2023: The first global 10-meter resolution coastline dataset derived from enhanced Sentinel-2 composite imagery using Google Earth Engine

explanation: 该研究聚焦于东格林兰边缘冰区中涡旋的深度学习检测与影像分析，主要使用Sentinel-1卫星的SAR遥感技术。虽然SAR属于遥感技术，但研究核心是海洋/冰区涡旋物理特征与影像解译，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如气溶胶、空气质量、大气成分等）。因此相关性较弱。
authors: Fei Jiang;Xiaofeng Li;Yingjie Liu;Yibin Ren
title: Deep learning detection and analysis of eddies in the East Greenland marginal ice zone from Sentinel-1 SAR imagery

explanation: 该论文通过多源遥感数据融合、机器学习算法及LGA-Infiltration模型，研究美国农田地表与根系土壤湿度的高分辨率反演。其核心技术（多源遥感数据整合）与卫星观测、地表参数反演等大气环境遥感应用密切相关，且土壤湿度数据可为大气水循环模型提供输入，间接服务于大气环境监测。
topic_words: ['multi-source remote sensing data', 'machine learning', 'Layered Green and Ampt model']
authors: Shuohao Cai;Yijia Xu;Zhengwei Yang;Wade T. Crow;Zhou Zhang;Jiali Shang;Jiangui Liu;Peter La Follette;Chris Reberg-Horton;Harry Schomberg;Steven Mirsky;Brian Davis;Sarah Seehaver;Alexis Correira;Andrea Basche;Ashley Waggoner;Charles Ellis;Dara Park;Danielle D. Treadwell;David Campbell
title: High-resolution surface and rootzone soil moisture over US cropland: A novel framework assimilating multi-source remote sensing data, machine learning, and the Layered Green and Ampt Infiltration with Redistribution model

explanation: 该论文探讨利用深度学习和基础模型在无标注条件下对PlanetScope卫星图像进行云掩膜技术，重点针对北极地区。云掩膜是大气遥感中关键步骤，通过去除云层干扰，可更精准地提取地表或大气数据，如反演大气成分、监测空气质量等。北极作为敏感大气环境区域，相关技术对全球气候变化研究有重要价值。
authors: Zhili Li;Yiqun Xie;Sergii Skakun;Xiaowei Jia;Gengchen Mai;William Lu;Matthew Tong;Zhihao Wang
title: Annotation-free cloud masking for PlanetScope images in the Arctic via cross-platform ability transfer using deep learning and foundation models

explanation: 该论文标题明确提到使用独立成分分析（独立成分）合并卫星数据产品（satellite data products），而'Constrained negentropy optimisation'（受约束的负熵优化）是一种算法，用于卫星数据融合（如处理不同传感器或时间的数据）。这些关键词直接关联到大气环境遥感技术中的卫星观测数据融合、算法优化和大气成分分析。
authors: Suraj Shah;Yi Liu;Seokhyeon Kim;Ashish Sharma
title: Constrained negentropy optimisation (CoNE-opt): Using independent components to merge satellite data products

explanation: 该论文主要研究使用Sentinel-1卫星的干涉相干数据监测湿地洪水脉冲，属于水文遥感和地表监测领域。尽管涉及卫星观测技术（如Sentinel-1），但其核心应用是水循环与湿地动态，而非大气环境（如空气质量、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演），因此与大气环境遥感关联较弱。
authors: Louis Gaudaré;Samuel Corgne;Marc Jolivet;Olivier Dauteuil;Cécile Doubre;Piotr Wolski;Raphaël Grandin;Marie-Pierre Doin;Philippe Durand;FLATSIM Working Group
title: Flood pulse monitoring in wetlands with multi-temporal Sentinel-1 interferometric coherence data: Application to the Okavango Delta (Botswana)

explanation: 该研究基于RADARSAT卫星的跨极化技术，专注于北极海冰运动监测与高分辨率分析，其核心应用领域为海洋与冰川遥感（ cryosphere remote sensing），而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演）。因此，与严格意义上的'atmospheric environmental remote sensing'关联较弱。
authors: Alexander S. Komarov;Mathieu Plante;Jean-François Lemieux;Stephen E.L. Howell;Mike Brady
title: The role of cross-polarization in producing high-resolution pan-Arctic sea ice motion from the RADARSAT Constellation Mission over several years

explanation: 该论文使用VIIRS卫星传感器信息来改进美国西部地区的火灾追踪，属于卫星遥感技术在环境监测中的应用。尽管火灾追踪主要关注地表变化，但VIIRS作为卫星遥感设备，其数据在分析大气组成（如烟雾颗粒物）、火灾影响评估等方面与大气环境遥感技术直接相关。
authors: Shane R. Coffield;Tempest D. McCabe;Wilfrid Schroeder;Yang Chen;Rebecca C. Scholten;Elijah Orland;Tianjia Liu;Elizabeth Wiggins;James T. Randerson;Melanie Follette-Cook;Douglas C. Morton
title: Leveraging additional VIIRS information to improve wildfire tracking in the western US

explanation: 该论文标题明确提到遥感技术（remote sensing）在碳量（quantities）和质量（quality）建模中的应用，特别是针对碳信用（carbon credits）这一与大气环境监测密切相关的领域。碳建模涉及大气成分分析、温室气体反演等技术，属于大气环境遥感技术的范畴。
authors: Peng Fu;Carl Bernacchi;Brendan Malone;James Kellner;Uta Heiden
title: Preface: The role of remote sensing to improve modeling of carbon quantities and quality of carbon credits

explanation: 该论文主要研究树木分支尺度生长策略，使用树定量结构模型的时间序列分析，其核心是植物生理学与生态模型，未涉及卫星观测、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演等遥感技术。关键词如'tree quantitative structure model'和'branch-scale'表明其属于植被结构建模领域，与大气环境遥感无直接关联。
topic_words: ['tree quantitative structure model', 'boundary conditions', 'time series', 'branch-scale tree growth', 'strategies']
authors: Hanna Elisabet Sorokina;Mariana Campos;Pasi Raumonen;Anna Shcherbacheva;Rami Echriti;Juha Hyyppä;Eetu Puttonen;Yunsheng Wang
title: Boundary conditions for studying branch-scale tree growth strategies using tree quantitative structure model time series

explanation: 该论文聚焦于东aacian藏运输走廊的高温热损毁风险区预测，核心是应用卷积神经网络和位置信息融合技术进行地理空间风险评估，主要涉及地表温度、城市规划或交通工程领域，未明确提及大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星观测数据、气溶胶反演或大气成分分析）等关键技术术语。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的直接关联较弱。
topic_words: ['高温热损毁风险区', '卷积神经网络', '位置信息融合']
authors: Zhe Chen;Si Guo;Huadong Guo;Zhengbo Yu;Xiangqi Lei;Qingyun Ji;Ziqiong He;Ruichun Chang;Zhongchang Sun;Xiangjun Pei;Zhongli Zhou;Lorenzo Picco
title: Prediction and interpretation of high-temperature heat damage risk zones in the Eastern Tibetan Transport Corridor based on a location-information-fusion convolution neural network

explanation: 该研究使用SDGSAT-1卫星的Glimmer图像进行城市路灯密度和数量估算，虽然涉及遥感技术，但核心应用是基础设施统计而非大气环境监测、污染物分析或卫星遥感技术本身在大气科学中的应用，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Ziqi Yin;Mingquan Wu;Zheng Niu;Li Wang;Changyong Dou
title: Streetlight density and quantity estimation using glimmer images from SDGSAT-1

explanation: 该论文探讨合成孔径雷达（SAR）在热带气旋研究中的应用，SAR是一种通过卫星或飞机搭载的远程传感技术，常用于大气监测（如云层、降水、地表变化分析），属于大气环境遥感技术领域。
authors: Alexis Mouche;Arthur Avenas;Paul Chang;Bertrand Chapron;Théo Cévaër;Clément Combot;Joseph Courtney;Quentin Febvre;Ralph C. title: Fostering tropical cyclone research and applications with Synthetic Aperture Radar

explanation: 该论文主要研究利用Sentinel-1双极化SAR图像对北极冬季海冰进行分类，属于极地环境遥感领域，而非直接涉及大气环境监测技术（如空气污染物、大气成分分析或卫星观测空气质量）。
authors: Yan Dai;Xiao-Ming Li;Haotian Yuan
title: Pan-Arctic winter sea ice classification using Sentinel-1 dual-polarized SAR images

explanation: 该论文主要研究Sentinel-1卫星的全球洪水监测服务，尽管涉及卫星遥感技术，但其核心应用场景为地表水监测和灾害预警，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、大气成分、气溶胶等）的遥感反演或观测技术。
authors: Wolfgang Wagner;Bernhard Bauer-Marschallinger;Florian Roth;Tobias Raiger-Stachl;Christoph Reimer;Niall McCormick;Patrick Matgen;Marco Chini;Yu Li;Sandro Martinis;Marc Wieland;Franziska Kraft;Davide Festa;Muhammed Hassaan;Mark Edwin Tupas;Jie Zhao;Michaela Seewald;Michael Riffler;Luca Molini;Richard Kidd
title: The fully-automatic Sentinel-1 Global Flood Monitoring service: Scientific challenges and future directions

explanation: 该论文标题明确提到Sentinel-3卫星数据（Sentinel-3 swath data），而Sentinel系列卫星是欧洲航天局（ESA）专门用于地球环境监测的卫星，其搭载的OCO-2（大气碳观测）、SLSTR（海面温度辐射计）等传感器可直接获取大气成分、辐射传输等数据。文中提出的PAGrid算法用于条带数据的无缝插值（seamless mapping），这一技术对提升大气环境监测数据的连续性和精度至关重要。因此，该研究属于大气环境遥感技术应用范畴。
authors: Dong Li;Anirudh Belwalkar;Tao Cheng;Kang Yu
title: PAGrid: A probabilistic area-weighted gridding method for seamless mapping of sentinel-3 swath data

explanation: 该论文聚焦于Sentinel-1雷达卫星反演土壤湿度，属于地表参数监测范畴。虽然卫星遥感技术通用，但题目明确指向土壤湿度，未涉及空气/大气成分分析、气溶胶反演或空气质量监测等直接相关领域，因此判定为不相关。
authors: Mehdi Rahmati;Anna Balenzano;Michel Bechtold;Luca Brocca;Anke Fluhrer;Thomas Jagdhuber;Kleanthis Karamvasis;David Mengen;Rolf H. Reichle;Seung-bum Kim;Ruhollah Taghizadeh-Mehrjardi;Jeffrey Walker;Liujun Zhu;Carsten Montzka
title: Soil moisture retrieval from Sentinel-1: Lessons learned after more than a decade in orbit

explanation: 该论文聚焦于利用遥感技术监测北森林排水泥炭地的生态恢复效果，涉及地表变化和植被覆盖评估，而非直接针对大气环境参数（如空气质量、温室气体或气溶胶分布）。其应用场景偏向生态恢复领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测大气成分或气溶胶）的关联性较弱。
authors: Lauri Ikkala;Ismail;Franziska Wolff;Hannu Marttila;Anna-Kaisa Ronkanen;Pavel Alekseychik;Parvez Rana;Marko Kohv;Teemu Tahvanainen;Anne Tolvanen;Ali Torabi Haghighi;Timo Kumpula;Christopher Osborne;Jari Ilmonen;Tuomas Haapalehto;Bjørn Kløve;Aleksi Räsänen
title: Remote sensing applications for monitoring restoration outcomes in boreal forestry-drained peatlands - Reviewed applications and future potential

explanation: 该论文主要研究华北平原的地下水体积损失和地面沉降问题，使用的是宽区域InSAR测量和机械建模。虽然InSAR属于遥感技术，但其应用场景聚焦于地表形变和地质工程领域，而非直接的大气环境监测、卫星观测、气溶胶反演或空气质量分析。因此，与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
topic_words: ['InSAR', 'land subsidence', 'groundwater volume loss', 'North China plain', 'mechanical modeling']
authors: Xing Zhang;Jun Hu;Mahdi Motagh;Mingjia Li;Yuedong Wang;Qiuhong Yang;Guangli Su;Haigang Wang
title: Groundwater volume loss and land subsidence in the North China plain investigated using wide-area InSAR surveying and mechanical modeling

explanation: 该论文研究被动卫星观测中忽略气溶胶-云共存效应对地表太阳辐射估算的影响，涉及卫星遥感技术（如光学传感器）在大气成分（气溶胶、云层）分析和辐射传输模型中的应用，直接关联到气溶胶反演、大气参数遥感监测等大气环境遥感领域的关键技术。
topic_words: ['aerosol-cloud coexistence', 'surface solar radiation estimates', 'passive satellite observations']
authors: Qin Lang;Ming Zhang;Qiuhua He;Shikuan Jin;Wenmin Qin;Lingxia Luo;Lunche Wang
title: Significant uncertainties from overlooking aerosol-cloud coexistence in surface solar radiation estimates using passive satellite observations

explanation: 该论文主要关注东南澳大利亚森林火灾严重程度的量化，使用了R-VSPI和VSPI两种方法。虽然这些技术可能涉及遥感数据（如卫星影像），但研究重点在于森林生态和火灾影响评估，未直接涉及大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。

explanation: 该研究主要关注利用空间搭载的高光谱影像反演森林生态系统中的叶片和冠层特征，核心目标是植被属性分析而非直接涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、温室气体、气溶胶等）。高光谱遥感技术虽可用于大气成分分析，但本文的焦点在于植被遥感，因此相关性较弱。
topic_words: ['spaceborne hyperspectral imagery', 'leaf and canopy traits', 'forest ecosystems']

authors: Jianing Wei;Kang Yang;Yuxin Zhu;Yuhan Wang;Xiaoyu Guo
title: Satellite monitoring of Greenland wintertime buried lake drainage and potential ice flow response

explanation: 论文标题和摘要明确提到使用遥感技术解决土地覆盖缺失模态的问题，并基于EarthMiss数据集提出MetaRS方法。尽管涉及遥感技术，但其核心应用是地表覆盖（如植被、水体、城市等）的补全，而非直接针对大气环境监测（如空气污染、大气成分分析或卫星大气观测）。土地覆盖属于地表观测范畴，与大气环境遥感技术存在明确的技术和应用场景差异。
authors: Yiheng Zhou;Ailong Ma;Junjue Wang;Zihang Chen;Yanfei Zhong
title: Remote sensing meta modal representation for missing modality land cover mapping: From EarthMiss dataset to MetaRS method

explanation: 该研究主要关注通过地面与卫星数据融合获取每日植被面积指数，属于生态环境遥感监测范畴。虽然涉及卫星观测技术，但核心目标为植被监测（绿度指数），而非直接针对大气环境要素（如空气质量、大气成分、气溶胶反演等），因此与'大气环境遥感技术'的关联性较弱。
authors: Wenjuan Li;Marie Weiss;Samuel Buis;Aleixandre Verger;Sylvain Jay;Zihan Ren;Wenbin Wu;Jingyi Jiang;Alexis Comar;Benoit De Solan
title: NRT-GSF: A novel near-real-time ground-satellite fusion algorithm to retrieve daily green area index at field scale

authors: Cailin Zhou;Tiangang Yin;Shanshan Wei;Bruce D. Cook;Weiwei Tan;Wai Yeung Yan;Qi Chen;Jean-Philippe Gastellu-Etchegorry

authors: Rongkun Zhao;Shangrong Wu;Yun Shao;Xuexiao Wu;Yan Zha;Zhiqu Liu;Ming Liu;Yongli Guo;Lang Xia;Wenbin Wu;Peng Yang;Huajun Tang
title: Inversion of total photosynthetic area index of oilseed rape based on a multilayer microwave scattering semiempirical model adapted to each phenological stage

explanation: 该论文主要研究沙漠灌木场景的方向反射率建模，属于地表光学特性分析领域，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如气溶胶、污染物浓度）的遥感反演或监测技术。BRDF模型虽在遥感中应用广泛，但此处聚焦于地表反射特性而非大气环境分析。
authors: Henggang Zhang;Xu Ma;Huaguo Huang;Ziti Jiao;Fei Zhang
title: A method to model the directional reflectance for desert shrub scenes in a general framework of kernel-driven BRDF model

explanation: 该论文标题明确提到卫星光谱数据滤波（satellite spectral data filtering），而光谱数据滤波是大气环境遥感技术中的关键预处理步骤。尽管研究主要应用于土壤实验室数据，但提出的SQuaP协议（光谱质量协议）旨在提升卫星光谱数据的可靠性和标准化，这一技术方法对大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等大气遥感应用具有普适性意义。
authors: Bruno dos Anjos Bartsch;José A.M. Demattê;Nikolaos Tziolas;Jorge Tadeu Fim Rosas;Gabriel Pimenta Barbosa de Sousa;Nicolas Augusto Rosin;Giannis Gallios;Borges Marfrann Dias Melo
title: Soil laboratory and satellite spectral data filtering: A Spectral Quality Protocol (SQuaP)

explanation: 该论文研究利用热红外卫星观测数据驱动方法来表征灌溉时间，热卫星观测属于大气环境遥感技术范畴。灌溉时间分析涉及地表温度、土壤湿度等参数，这些与大气环境参数（如植被覆盖、气溶胶分布）存在间接关联，符合卫星观测技术在大气环境监测中的共性应用场景。
authors: Ehsan Jalilvand;Sujay V. Kumar;Charles Truong;Erin Haacker;Sarith Mahanama
title: Characterization of irrigation timing using thermal satellite observations, a data-driven approach

explanation: 该论文主要研究基于Sentinel-1 SAR技术在不同地表覆盖条件下土壤湿度反演，核心涉及地表参数反演和合成孔径雷达技术。虽然SAR技术也可用于大气遥感（如云层、气溶胶观测），但本文研究对象为土壤湿度（陆地表面参数）和地表覆盖类型，属于地球表面遥感（terrestrial remote sensing）范畴，而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析等）。
authors: Zhihao Shen;Qisheng He;Chenghui Yang;Zihao Cheng
title: Soil moisture retrieval under different land cover conditions based on Sentinel-1 SAR

explanation: 该研究利用空间搭载的PRISMA和NEON AOP传感器追踪不同森林类型和生态区植物性状的季节变化。PRISMA和NEON AOP属于大气遥感技术，通过监测植被参数间接反映大气环境（如气溶胶光学厚度、地表反照率等），与空气质量监测、卫星大气成分分析等应用紧密相关。
authors: Fujiang Ji;Ting Zheng;Alexey N. Shiklomanov;Ruqi Yang;Philip A. Townsend;Fa Li;Dalei Hao;Hamid Dashti;Kyle R. Kovach;Hangkai You;Junxiong Zhou;Min Chen
title: Tracking seasonal variability in plant traits from spaceborne PRISMA and NEON AOP across forest types and ecoregions

explanation: 该论文主要研究东北中俄边境线（Bei'an–Hei'he highway）沿线永久冻土变形，涉及地表地质监测和遥感技术（如多源数据融合、地面形变分析），属于地球科学领域而非大气环境遥感（如空气质量、大气成分、卫星观测等）
authors: Aoxiang Yan;Shanzhen Li;Xiaoying Jin;Shuai Huang;Wenhui Wang;Jianjun Tang;Anyuan Li;Ze Zhang;Shengrong Zhang;Jinbang Zhai;Lanzhi Lü;Ruixia He;Xiaoying Li;Wei Shan;Ying Guo;Huijun Jin
title: Multi-source assessment of permafrost deformation along the Bei'an–Hei'he highway in Northeast China

explanation: 该论文探讨了干旱和热浪对落叶林冠层叶绿素荧光和总初级生产的影响。冠层叶绿素荧光是植被遥感的核心观测指标，而GPP的估算常依赖卫星遥感数据。研究主题直接涉及大气环境（如干旱、热浪）与植被动态的相互作用，符合大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、大气参数反演）的应用场景。
topic_words: ['canopy chlorophyll fluorescence', 'Gross Primary Production (GPP)', 'heat waves', 'atmospheric dryness']
authors: Zhaohui Li;Gabriel Hmimina;Gwendal Latouche;Daniel Berveiller;Abderrahmane Ounis;Yves Goulas;Kamel Soudani
title: Atmospheric dryness effects on canopy chlorophyll fluorescence and Gross Primary Production (GPP) in a deciduous forest during heat waves

explanation: 该论文主要研究江汉平原2013-2022年作物-水产协同培养引发的土地利用变化，侧重于土地利用类型的分类框架构建与空间分析。虽然涉及遥感数据分类技术，但核心内容聚焦于农业经济模式下的地表覆盖演变，未明确涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、大气成分或卫星反演技术），因此与大气环境遥感技术关联性较弱。
authors: Yanbing Wei;Wenjuan Li;Peng Zhu;Qiangyi Yu;Wenbin Wu
title: Characterizing land use changes triggered by crop-aquaculture co-cultivation from 2013 to 2022 based on a robust classification framework: Illustration in Jianghan Plain, China

explanation: 该论文主要研究地球观测数据与超分辨率水文模型的对比验证，虽然涉及地球观测技术（如卫星遥感），但其核心应用是水文建模而非直接针对大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析）。因此相关性较弱。
authors: Almudena García-García;Pietro Stradiotti;Federico Di Paolo;Paolo Filippucci;Milan Fischer;Matěj Orság;Luca Brocca;Jian Peng;Wouter Dorigo;Alexander Gruber;Bram Droppers;Niko Wanders;Arjen Haag;Albrecht Weerts;Ehsan Modiri;Oldrich Rakovec;Félix Francés;Matteo Dall’Amico;Martha Anderson;Christopher Hain
title: Intercomparison of Earth Observation products for hyper-resolution hydrological modelling over Europe

explanation: 该论文主要研究使用基于合成数据训练的神经网络对未调查区域作物生长进度的监测。虽然可能涉及卫星遥感数据（如植被指数），但其核心关注点在于农业监测中的机器学习应用，而非直接针对大气环境参数（如污染物、气体成分、气溶胶反演等）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: George Worrall;Jasmeet Judge
title: In-season crop progress in unsurveyed regions using networks trained on synthetic data

explanation: 该论文研究合成孔径雷达（SAR）C波段和L波段双极化数据对热带地区早期森林砍伐的检测能力。尽管森林砍伐属于土地利用变化，但SAR技术常用于环境监测中的地表参数反演（如植被覆盖、地表湿度），而这些地表参数与大气环境（如碳通量、地表反照率）密切相关。因此，通过雷达技术分析地表变化，间接支持了大气环境监测，属于相关领域。
authors: Africa I. Flores-Anderson;Jeffrey A. Cardille;Josef Kellndorfer;Franz J. Meyer;Pontus Olofsson
title: On the sensitivity of SAR C- and L-band dual-polarized data for detection of early deforestation in the tropics

explanation: 该论文使用InSAR技术进行全国土地沉降的测绘和特征分析，属于地表变形监测领域。虽然InSAR是遥感技术的一种，但其核心应用场景为地表位移（如城市沉降、地震形变），与大气环境遥感（如空气污染监测、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等）的研究对象和方法差异较大，因此相关性较低。
authors: Zhiqiang Xiong;Guangcai Feng;Zefa Yang;Hua Gao;Wenbin Xu;Lei Zhang;Xiaohua Xu;Zhong Lu;Jun Hu;Zhiwei Li;Jianjun Zhu
title: Nationwide mapping and characterization of land subsidence in the United States using InSAR

explanation: 该论文利用MODIS卫星观测数据，通过约束深度神经网络估计地表辐射预算的各个分量。地表辐射预算是大气能量平衡分析的核心参数，MODIS作为卫星传感器，其数据常用于大气成分（如辐射传输、气溶胶反演）和环境监测。尽管未直接提及污染物或气溶胶，但辐射预算的估算与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
authors: Jianglei Xu;Shunlin Liang;Han Ma;Yongzhe Chen;Wenyuan Li;Yichuan Ma;Xiang Zhao;Bo Jiang;Xiaotong Zhang;Shikang Guan
title: Joint estimation of global daily 1 km surface radiation budget components from MODIS observations (2000−2023) using conservation-constrained deep neural networks

explanation: 该论文通过火灾辐射功率评估研究，结合三重集合校准和交叉验证方法，旨在减少遥感数据中的检测偏差。火灾辐射功率是大气环境监测中利用卫星遥感技术量化火灾影响的关键指标，其分析直接关联到大气能量平衡、烟雾气溶胶反演等遥感应用领域。
authors: Yoojin Kang;Jaese Lee;Jungho Im
title: Comprehensive global fire radiative power evaluation by minimizing detection bias with intercomparison and extended triple collocation analysis

explanation: 该论文聚焦于利用深度学习和亚米级分辨率技术对加利福尼亚州复杂地形中的木本植被和地表建筑结构进行精细制图，属于地表特征解译和土地利用分类领域。虽然涉及遥感技术（如高分辨率卫星或无人机影像处理），但其核心目标并非大气环境参数监测（如空气质量指标、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演），而是基于高精度影像的地物分类和空间建模，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Yunzhe Zhu;Dan J. Dixon;Yufang Jin
title: Scalable sub-meter mapping of woody vegetation and structures across California’s heterogeneous landscape using deep learning

explanation: 该论文通过MISR（中分辨率成像光谱仪）和GEDI（全球钻探地球物理数据集）的遥感数据，结合NASA碳监测系统数据，评估美国西南部森林地上生物量。MISR和GEDI均为卫星遥感传感器/数据集，属于大气环境遥感技术领域；森林生物量与大气碳循环密切相关，研究涉及卫星遥感技术在碳汇监测中的应用，符合大气环境遥感技术的范畴。
authors: Mark J. Chopping;Zhuosen Wang;Crystal B. Schaaf;Michael Bull
title: Forest aboveground biomass in the southwestern U.S. from MISR and GEDI: Assessment with NASA Carbon Monitoring System data

explanation: 该论文专注于利用Sentinel-2多光谱卫星图像快速、准确监测地表烧毁区域。虽然直接研究大气环境成分（如气溶胶、臭氧浓度），但卫星遥感技术（Sentinel-2）和地表环境变化（burned areas）均属于大气环境遥感技术的应用范畴，地表烧毁区域可能释放烟雾颗粒影响大气质量，与大气环境监测存在间接关联。
authors: Peng Liu;Yongxue Liu;Xiaoxiao Guo;Yuchen Liu;Wanjing Zhao;Wenxuan Xu
title: Faster, better, and more accurate mapping of burned areas using Sentinel-2 multispectral images

explanation: 论文主要研究海冰上雷达波形分解及积雪对高度计的影响，属于海洋物理遥感和冰川监测领域，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如气溶胶、空气质量、大气成分）的遥感技术或分析。
authors: Lu Zhou;Henriette Skourup;Julienne Stroeve;Sahra Kacimi;Stefanie Arndt;Weixin Zhu;Alek Petty;Lanqing Huang;Shiming Xu
title: Snow effects on altimeter waveforms over sea ice in the Weddell Sea — Part I: Radar waveform decomposition

explanation: 该论文通过DEASE方法研究城市热岛效应的强度、影响范围和容量估算，属于利用遥感技术（如卫星或传感器观测）对地表环境参数（如温度分布）的分析，直接关联到大气环境监测中的热岛效应评估和遥感算法开发。
authors: Qiquan Yang;Richen Ye;TC Chakraborty;Ting Hu;Yue Liu
title: Estimation of intensity, footprint, and capacity of surface urban heat islands using a direction-enhanced adaptive synchronous extraction (DEASE) method

explanation: 该论文研究欧洲地区太阳辐射趋势，重点关注云和气溶胶的作用评估，直接涉及大气环境遥感技术中的关键参数（气溶胶、云覆盖）和遥感方法（多源数据融合与太阳辐射观测），与卫星观测、大气组成分析和气溶胶反演技术高度相关。
authors: Leandro C. Segado-Moreno;José A. Ruiz-Arias;Juan Pedro Montávez;Juraj Betak
title: Past, current and future solar radiation trends in Europe: Multi-source assessment of the role of clouds and aerosols

explanation: 该论文聚焦于火灾后桉树恢复过程中遥感信号的差异，主要研究植被结构和功能性状的遥感反演。虽涉及遥感技术，但核心是生态系统恢复的植被遥感监测，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如空气质量、气溶胶、温室气体等）或卫星大气成分分析，因此相关性较低。
authors: Feng Qiu;Jinlong Zang;Yongguang Zhang
title: Divergent remote sensing signals in long-term post-fire Eucalyptus recovery: Structural vs. functional traits

explanation: 该论文研究SAR（合成孔径雷达）与光学遥感数据融合技术，用于同步处理异构时间序列数据并重构地表反射率。SAR和光学数据在环境监测中常用于大气校正、气溶胶反演及地表覆盖监测，通过融合多源遥感数据提升环境参数反演精度，与大气环境遥感技术直接相关。
authors: Kai Tang;Xuehong Chen;Tianyu Liu;Anqi Li;Yao Tang;Peng Yang;Jin Chen
title: AnytimeFormer: Fusing irregular and asynchronous SAR-optical time series to reconstruct reflectance at any given time

explanation: 该论文研究光谱与太阳诱导叶绿素荧光（SIF）的关系及其在光合作用估算中的应用。SIF是植被遥感的重要指标，通过光谱分析SIF可反演植被光合参数，进而用于大气碳汇监测、植被覆盖评估等大气环境遥感领域。
authors: Ji Li;Lianhong Gu;Jing M. Chen;Yongguang Zhang
title: The relationship between spectral and integrated sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence and its implication for photosynthesis estimation using fluorescence observations

explanation: 该论文利用Sentinel-2卫星数据合成与数据平衡技术预测农田土壤有机质和黏粒含量。尽管研究重点在土壤，但Sentinel-2作为卫星遥感平台，其数据在环境监测（包括大气与地表结合分析）中具有应用价值，与卫星观测、地表参数反演等大气环境遥感技术相关。
authors: Tom Broeg;Axel Don;Thomas Scholten;Stefan Erasmi
title: Reducing bias in cropland soil organic carbon and clay predictions using Sentinel-2 composites and data balancing

explanation: 该研究专注于无人机搭载的GPR技术测量土壤湿度，属于地表遥感和精准农业领域，未涉及大气环境参数（如空气质量、温室气体、卫星大气成分分析等）的监测或分析。
authors: Kaijun Wu;Jean Artois;Denis Tourneur;Merlin Mareschal;Maud Henrion;Sashini Pathirana;Lakshman Galagedara;Quentin Limbourg;Sébastien Lambot
title: Automated drone-borne GPR mapping of root-zone soil moisture for precision irrigation

explanation: 该研究基于SWOT卫星数据云进行洪水范围提取，SWOT作为卫星观测技术属于大气环境遥感范畴，其应用涉及地表水监测与灾害评估，与题目要求的技术领域直接相关。
authors: Quentin Bonassies;Christophe Fatras;Santiago Peña-Luque;Pierre Dubois;Andrea Piacentini;Ludovic Cassan;Sophie Ricci;Thanh Huy Nguyen
title: A comprehensive study of Surface Water and Ocean Topography (SWOT) Pixel Cloud data for flood extent extraction

explanation: 该研究聚焦于‘暗夜质量’（light pollution）与‘星空保护区’选址，主要整合多源空间数据并通过随机森林模型分析。尽管涉及空间数据整合，但‘暗夜质量’属于光污染领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等）无直接关联。
topic_words: ['dark sky quality', 'multi-source spatial data', 'random forest model']
authors: Zhaobo Li;Ruihan Xing;Qiyao Ling;Ziran Wei;Zuo Wang;Qing Ji;Kaifang Shi
title: Exploring global dark sky quality and potential dark sky park site selection: Integrating multi-source spatial data with random forest model

explanation: 该论文聚焦于利用InSAR闭合相位反演地表土壤湿度，属于地表水文遥感和地形变化监测领域。虽然InSAR技术本身是遥感手段，但其研究目标为土壤湿度建模与预测，与大气环境（如空气质量、大气成分、气溶胶等）无直接关联。
authors: Yujie Zheng;Heresh Fattahi
title: Modeling, prediction, and retrieval of surface soil moisture from InSAR closure phase

explanation: 该研究通过可微的三维辐射传输模型反演植被和土壤的光谱特性，为大气遥感中的地表参数解耦提供技术基础。植被-土壤光谱特征直接影响卫星大气参数反演（如气溶胶、温室气体）的精度，其方法可应用于大气环境监测中的地表参数校正，因此与大气环境遥感技术间接相关。
topic_words: ['leaf spectral properties', 'soil spectral properties', 'differentiable 3D radiative transfer']
authors: Jianbo Qi;Jifan Wei;Mengqi Xia;Donghui Xie
title: Retrieving fine-scale leaf and soil spectral properties from canopy reflectance with differentiable 3D radiative transfer

explanation: 该论文聚焦欧洲潮间带海草的初步制图，属于海洋生物学与遥感技术结合的应用领域，研究目标为水下植被分布监测。其核心关注点是近海生态系统的空间表征，与大气环境遥感（如卫星观测大气成分、空气质量监测等）在研究对象（海洋 vs. 大气）、技术指标（水下植被指数 vs. 气溶胶/二氧化碳浓度反演）及应用场景（生态保护 vs. 空气污染治理）上存在显著差异。
authors: Bede Ffinian Rowe Davies;Simon Oiry;Mar Roca;Philippe Rosa;Maria Laura Zoffoli;Dimitris Poursanidis;Tobias Dolch;Bárbara Ondiviela;Cristina Galván;Ana C. Brito;Richard J. Lilley;Laura L. Govers;Martin Gade;Laurent Barillé;Pierre Gernez
title: An initial map of European intertidal seagrass

explanation: 该论文专注于云长波辐射强迫的估算算法开发与验证。云辐射强迫是大气辐射平衡的重要参数，其监测依赖于卫星遥感技术（如气象卫星观测大气成分和辐射特性）。算法开发直接关联到通过遥感数据反演大气成分（如云层特性、辐射传输参数），属于大气环境遥感技术的应用范畴。
topic_words: ['longwave cloud radiative forcing', 'algorithm development', 'radiative forcing estimation']
authors: Chuanye Shi;Tianxing Wang;Zheng Li;Dahui Li;Husi Letu
title: Towards an easy-to-use algorithm to estimate longwave cloud radiative forcing: algorithm development and preliminary evaluation

explanation: 标题为'Editorial Board'，未提及与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、污染物监测、大气成分分析等）直接相关的研究内容。摘要信息缺失，无法进一步判断其相关性。
title: Editorial Board

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注沿海水域中营养物质的监测，属于水环境或海洋科学领域。虽然使用了深度学习技术，但核心研究对象是地表或近海的水质分析，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星监测空气成分、气溶胶、温室气体等）无直接关联。
authors: Yiqiang Hu;Weikang Zhan;Qingyou He;Yunchen Liu;Haigang Zhan
title: A spatially-informed interpretable deep learning framework for high-resolution nutrient monitoring in complex coastal waters

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文专注于地形数字高程模型（DEM）的超分辨率重建，提出了一种基于概率模型的传输机制（RRDPM）。虽然涉及遥感技术，但其核心是地形高程的精细化数据处理，与大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星大气成分分析、气溶胶反演）无直接关联。论文关键词集中在地理空间建模，而非大气环境遥感领域。
authors: Jianbing Chen;Ziyin Wu;Fanlin Yang;Mingwei Wang;Xianhai Bu;Xiaodong Cui;Jihong Shang;Dineng Zhao;Jieqiong Zhou;Yang liu
title: RRDPM: Relay residual diffusion probabilistic model for global typical land and seabed DEM super-resolution

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文基于ICESat-2激光雷达（LiDAR）数据点云技术，研究北极海冰表面融水池塘的深度估算方法，属于利用遥感传感器（LiDAR）获取地表和大气环境（海冰融化）数据的技术应用。LiDAR作为主动遥感技术，常用于大气环境监测和地表参数反演，因此与大气环境遥感技术高度相关。
authors: Xiaoyi Shen;Haili Li;Chang-Qing Ke
title: An automated method for estimating the depth of melt ponds using ICESat-2 LiDAR point cloud data: application to surface melt of Arctic sea ice

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究通过卫星视频数据追踪移动车辆，采用时空高阶关系学习与推理方法。虽然使用了卫星数据（遥感技术的一种），但其核心目标是交通监控而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星观测大气成分、气溶胶反演等）。研究内容与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
topic_words: ['satellite video data', 'spatiotemporal relation learning', 'moving vehicles tracking']
authors: Ziyuan Feng;Xianfeng Zhang;Bo Zhou;Miao Ren;Xiaobo Zhi
title: Moving vehicles tracking from satellite video data based on spatiotemporal high-order relation learning and reasoning

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究通过遥感技术和集合模型预测非洲之角地区库蚊（An. stephensi）的环境适宜性与传播范围，虽聚焦生态扩散，但遥感技术（如卫星观测）直接关联大气环境监测技术中的数据获取方法，属于跨领域应用。
authors: Jinyang Li;Ming-Chieh Lee;Ai-Ling Jiang;Guiyun Yan;Kuolin Hsu
title: Predicting environmental suitability and future spread range of An. stephensi in the Greater Horn of Africa using remote sensing and ensemble modeling

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究InSAR（合成孔径雷达）与概率模型结合用于露天矿坑（goaf）的定位，属于地质工程与遥感技术的交叉应用，但其核心目标为采矿工程中的地表形变监测，未直接涉及大气环境（如空气质量、卫星大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等）的遥感技术或方法。
authors: Teng Wang;Yunjia Wang;Feng Zhao;Zhanguo Ma;Liyong Li;Sen Du;Kewei Zhang;Nianbin Zhang;Dawei Zhou;Xinpeng Diao;José Fernández
title: A coupled InSAR—Integrated probability model framework for goaf locating under different extraction conditions

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究通过SWOT观测的海平面变化对海洋重力恢复的误差影响及校正方法。SWOT（Soil and Water Observation Technology）卫星的观测目标侧重于地表水高度、土壤水分等地球观测和海洋学领域，而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析等）。论文核心围绕海洋重力场和海平面变化，属于地球物理或海洋技术范畴，与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Heyuan Sun;Taoyong Jin;Jiancheng Li;Huiyi Xian;Jiasheng Shi
title: Mitigating errors in marine gravity recovery induced by sea level variability in SWOT observations

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文研究干旱与热浪的复合指数，虽涉及蒸发蒸腾效应（evapotranspiration），但未明确提及卫星观测、遥感技术或大气环境监测（如污染物、大气成分分析）。其核心是构建新的指数模型，而非直接应用遥感技术进行数据获取或分析。
authors: Shengpeng Cao;Lei Li;Chunyang He;Tao Qi
title: Standardized compound drought and heatwave index: A new compound drought and heatwave events monitoring index considering evapotranspiration effects

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究聚焦青藏高原热喀斯特湖30年的动态及其驱动机制，核心涉及地表水文与地质过程。虽然可能间接用到遥感技术（如卫星影像监测湖面变化），但其研究主题属于地质生态学范畴，未明确涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、温室气体、臭氧层等）的遥感监测或分析，因此相关性较弱。
authors: Guoqing Yang;Haijun Qiu;Ninglian Wang;Dongdong Yang;Ya Liu;Kailiang Zhao
title: Unraveling three-decade dynamics and drivers of thermokarst lakes on the Tibetan Plateau

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究通过生成式扩散模型实现遥感图像的仿真到真实转换，专注于高分辨率船舶图像的细粒度识别。遥感技术属于大气环境监测的核心手段，船舶图像分析在海洋污染追踪、航运监管等大气环境相关领域有重要应用价值。
authors: Zhiming Deng;Baixin Ai;Tianyu Zhang;Cheng Wei;Xibin Cao
title: Sim-to-real image to image translation for remote sensing fine-grained ship images using generative diffusion models

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文研究SAR（合成孔径雷达）引导的光学图像中云层去除的扩散模型，涉及卫星遥感中的云检测技术。SAR属于大气遥感技术的一种，云去除直接影响卫星观测的大气数据质量，与大气环境监测、卫星遥感反演等研究方向密切相关。
authors: Liwen Cao;Jun Pan;Jiangong Xu;Tao Chen;Qiangqiang Yuan;Jizhang Sang
title: A global-local interaction and conditional consistency constrained diffusion model for SAR-guided optical image cloud removal

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究的核心是土壤湿度遥感，属于地球观测（terrestrial remote sensing）领域，而非专注于大气环境（如空气质量、卫星大气成分分析等）。虽然使用了AI技术，但应用场景为地表土壤参数，与大气环境监测技术关联较弱。
authors: Carsten Montzka;Luca Brocca;Hao Chen;Narendra N. Das;Antara Dasgupta;Mehdi Rahmati;Thomas Jagdhuber
title: AI in soil moisture remote sensing

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究基于频率感知动态卷积（FADConv）的耕地非农化识别与分割问题，其核心是农业用地变化检测。虽然可能涉及卫星遥感数据（属于远程传感技术），但研究重点在于土地利用分类和农业监测，而非大气环境参数（如空气质量、气溶胶组成等）的遥感分析。因此未达到‘强烈相关’标准。
authors: Tan Shu;Li Shen;Yong Wang;Peng Zhang
title: FADConv: A frequency-aware dynamic convolution for cropland non-agriculturalization identification and segmentation

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究聚焦于南沙群岛海草损失的人类与环境驱动因素，采用领域自适应深度学习模型分析。尽管涉及环境驱动因素和机器学习方法，但其核心是海洋生态（海草）和深度学习算法，未涉及大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、空气质量监测等关键领域术语或技术手段），因此与大气环境遥感相关性较弱。
authors: Hui Chen;Yiqun Ma;Longwei Li;Li Ye;Yehua Sheng;Ziyang Wang;Liang Cheng;Ka Zhang
title: Human impacts versus environmental drivers of seagrass loss in the Nansha islands: Evidence from domain-adaptive deep learning

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文研究主题为整合草地高度以提升地上生物量估算，主要涉及植被生态学和农业遥感技术。虽然可能使用卫星遥感数据（如光学或雷达传感器），但其核心目标是植被生物量监测，而非大气环境参数（如空气质量、气体成分、气溶胶分布等）。因此与大气环境遥感技术的直接关联较弱。
authors: Wuhua Wang;Jiakui Tang;Na Zhang;Xuefeng Xu;Anan Zhang;Yanjiao Wang;Yidan Wang;Shuohao Cai;Sandipan Mukharjee;Rajiv Pandey;Tong Li
title: Integrating grassland height for Enhanced aboveground biomass estimation in northern China

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文标题中提到改进 airborne LiDAR 的强度间隙概率估计方法，并考虑辐射效应。LiDAR 作为主动遥感技术，可通过测量大气中的散射粒子（如气溶胶）进行大气参数反演。radiometric effects 指大气条件（如云层、气溶胶）对 LiDAR 信号的影响，修正这些效应有助于提升大气环境监测的数据精度。因此，该研究通过优化 LiDAR 技术在航空平台上的辐射校正方法，与大气环境遥感技术直接相关。
authors: Lijie Guo;Lei Deng
title: An improved gap probability estimation method accounting for radiometric effects in airborne LiDAR intensity

explanation: 该论文主要研究东南亚地区社会经济和气候因素驱动的道路维护优先级评估，尽管使用了遥感技术，但核心内容聚焦于基础设施管理，未涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、卫星传感器数据、大气成分分析等）。
